lecturers.title: Person 1
lecturers.description: From a very young age, Arnaud Collery lead the life of a globe-trotter, staying for long periods of time in Tokyo, Paris, Los Angeles and New York, and working in areas as diverse as finance, luxury, tech, cinema and stand-up comedy.
